product_name: Profile T1 Plus Viper Carbon Aerobars
long_description: In races against the clock, position and comfort matter. The Profile T1 Plus Viper Carbon aerobars are highly adjustable for a fine-tuned position, letting you focus your efforts on shaving seconds. Ultralight carbon fiber extensions feature a ski bend shape with molded hand grips; extension length can be adjusted for optimal positioning and comfort. F-35 armrests boast a high degree of adjustment-including width, angle and rotation-letting you precisely dial in your fit. Forged 6061-T6 aluminum J3 mounting brackets fit both 26.0 and 31.8 mm handlebars and allow both the width and the angle of the extensions to be adjusted for a tuned position.
short_description: In races against the clock, position and comfort matter. The Profile T1 Plus Viper Carbon aerobars are highly adjustable for a fine-tuned position, letting you focus your efforts on shaving seconds.
